name: Xeo Saves the Galaxy
description:
Xeo Saves the Galaxy is fast-paced third-person flying game. You are the space dragon Xeo, and you must use daring acrobatics and  fire breath destroy the evil corporation's headquarters before they complete the Ultimate Weapon(TM).

Features:

Breath fire or shoot fireballs to destroy buildings and turrets before time runs out.

Fly around and avoid incoming fire.

Be a dragon. That is the most important part.

Controls:

W/S or Up/Down: Move forwards/backwards.

A/D or Left/Right: Descend/Ascend (Subject to change)

Mouse: Rotate left/right

Space or Left mouse: Shoot fireballs

Left shift or Right mouse: Breathe Fire

P or pause: Pause game.

Escape: Quit

R: Restart

Credits:

Font is by Vladimir Nikolic. Link: https://www.dafont.com/tourner.font

The cover image is: "The Andromeda Galaxy, Messier 31" by kees scherer is marked with CC PDM 1.0

Banner image is: "The Dwarf (Galaxy) in the Whale (Constellation)" by kees scherer is marked with CC PDM 1.0
